text: Days after their divorce was finalized, Bristol Palin took a dig at her ex - husband Dakota Meyer on Instagram, revealing that she'drove herself to and from the hospital'when she gave birth to their eldest daughter Sailor Grace - who was born while the couple was estranged and living in different states. The 27 - year - old took to her Instagram Stories on Saturday to post some throwback snaps from the day of Sailor's birth, showing herself cradling the now - two - and - a - half - year - old back in December 2015. But it wasn't all warm fuzzies for the mother - of - two, who wrote on Instagram that she has'never felt more alone'than she did when making the solo trip to the hospital. Drama : Bristol Pa
